DEMO-101.description: Add OAuth2 authentication flow for user login. Support Google and GitHub providers. This is a demo ticket for testing the PR review agent.
acceptanceCriteria: User can log in with Google OAuth2
User can log in with GitHub OAuth2
All authentication endpoints return proper HTTP status codes
Tokens are securely stored and encrypted

DEMO-102.description: Implement user profile CRUD operations with proper validation and error handling.
acceptanceCriteria: User can update their profile information
Profile updates are validated before saving
Error messages are clear and user-friendly
Profile data is sanitized to prevent XSS attacks

DEMO-103.description: Add rate limiting to all API endpoints to prevent abuse and ensure fair usage.
acceptanceCriteria: Rate limits are enforced per user/IP
Rate limit headers are included in responses
Rate limit exceeded returns 429 status code
Rate limits are configurable per endpoint
Rate limit information is logged for monitoring
